name: Yet another localization approach in Flutter
shortDescription: Mobile application that displays the schedule of the Flutter Global Summit Vol.2 conference that was held on December 08-09, 2021. It shows how Flutter applications can be localized with i69n package.
longDescription: Mobile application that displays the schedule of the Flutter Global Summit Vol.2 conference that was held on December 08-09, 2021. It shows how Flutter applications can be localized with i69n package.
